thread.title: Stevie J & Joseline Hernandez Reconcile, Already Want More Children – Report
thread.title_full: Stevie J & Joseline Hernandez Reconcile, Already Want More Children – Report

author: Jessica Bennett
title: Stevie J & Joseline Hernandez Reconcile, Already Want More Children – Report
text:
February 23, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Joseline Hernandez and Stevie J’ s relationship has been anything but smooth, taking a huge turn for the worse when the former dancer revealed she was pregnant during last year’s Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta Season 5 reunion. 
While the pair bickered throughout her pregnancy, the birth of Bonnie Bella seems to have reunited the pair, as they’re reportedly ready to have another child. 

The 45-year-old father of six is said to be ready for even more children, just two months after the birth of youngest daughter Bonnie, according to HollywoodLife. 
“Stevie loves being a dad and wants more kids. I could definitely see him getting Joseline pregnant again. The connection is still strong between them.” 
Credit: Instagram 
New mom Joseline is also currently in a loving mind state, posting a photo of herself kissing her baby daddy, with sources claiming she’s still not over him. 
“I know she’s still in love with him and she does want more babies. Why not have them with Stevie? It’s not something they’re trying for, no way, but it could happen.” 
Credit: VH1 
News of their reported reconciliation comes just one month after the “Puerto Rican Princess” referred to her ex as “Stevie Lame” on The Real. 

Stevie has been taking the high road however, dropping his lawsuit against the 30-year-old beauty and cancelling his petition for sole custody of their daughter. 
A post shared by Stevie J. (@hitmansteviej_1) on Jan 19, 2017 at 1:38pm PST 
Do you think these two are ready for baby #2! Sound off below.
